metadata.title: CVE-2024-4418 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[stack use-after-free in virNetClientIOEventLoop()]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-4418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss-libvirt - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-clients - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-clients-qemu - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-config-network - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-config-nwfilter - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-lxc - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-qemu - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-gluster - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-iscsi-direct - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-rbd - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-storage-zfs - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-vbox - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-driver-xen - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-system - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-system-systemd - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-daemon-system-sysv - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-l10n - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-login-shell - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-sanlock - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt-wireshark - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
libvirt0 - 10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.0-2ubuntu8.2').
